import boto3, ipaddress, random
import cfnresponse
ec2_client=boto3.client('ec2')
def lambda_handler(event, context):
  DefaultGateWay=''
  LicenseServerIp=''
  FirstDataNodeIp=''
  if event['RequestType'] == 'Create':
    DBNodeCount=int(event['ResourceProperties']['DBNodeCount'])
    DBStandByNodeCount=int(event['ResourceProperties']['DBStandByNodeCount'])
    SumNodes=DBNodeCount+DBStandByNodeCount+1
    SubnetId=event['ResourceProperties']['SubnetId']
    SubnetCidr=event['ResourceProperties']['SubnetCidr']
    SubnetObj=ipaddress.ip_network(SubnetCidr)
    net_interfaces=ec2_client.describe_network_interfaces(Filters=[{'Name':'subnet-id','Values':[SubnetId]}],DryRun=False)
    net_interfaces_ips=[]
    if net_interfaces['NetworkInterfaces']:
      net_interfaces_ips=[x['PrivateIpAddress'] for x in net_interfaces['NetworkInterfaces']]
    net_interfaces_ips.append(str(ipaddress.IPv4Address(int(ipaddress.IPv4Address(SubnetObj.network_address)) + 3)))
    net_interfaces_ips.append(SubnetObj.broadcast_address)
    net_interfaces_ips=sorted([int(ipaddress.IPv4Address(x)) for x in net_interfaces_ips])
    DefaultGateWay=str(ipaddress.IPv4Address(int(ipaddress.IPv4Address(SubnetObj.network_address))+1))
    Ranges={}
    Ranges['ranges']=[]
    for i in range(1, len(net_interfaces_ips)):
      if (net_interfaces_ips[i]-net_interfaces_ips[i-1])>SumNodes:
        range_obj={}
        range_obj['FirstIp']=net_interfaces_ips[i-1]+1
        range_obj['FirstIpAddress']=str(ipaddress.IPv4Address(net_interfaces_ips[i-1]+1))
        range_obj['LastIp']=net_interfaces_ips[i]-1
        range_obj['LastIpAddress']=str(ipaddress.IPv4Address(net_interfaces_ips[i]-1))
        Ranges['ranges'].append(range_obj)
    print(Ranges['ranges'])
    rnd=random.choice(Ranges['ranges'])
    LicenseServerIp=str(ipaddress.IPv4Address(rnd['FirstIp']))
    FirstDataNodeIp=str(ipaddress.IPv4Address(rnd['FirstIp']+1))
  cfnresponse.send(event, context, 'SUCCESS', { 'DefaultGateWay': DefaultGateWay, 'LicenseServerIp': LicenseServerIp, 'FirstDataNodeIp': FirstDataNodeIp })
